blogger.faq.a1: A Partner Blogger writes blog articles about expat life, travel, immigration, visas, or living abroad. Include your unique affiliate link in articles. When readers call a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10. That's it!
blogger.faq.a2: It depends on your blog traffic. 10 clients = $100. 50 clients = $500. Some bloggers earn $1000-3000/month by writing SEO-optimized articles that rank well on Google.
blogger.faq.a3: Expat helpers are experienced expats who provide practical advice and guidance. They're not lawyers, but they know the local system well and can help with everyday questions about visas, administration, housing, etc.
blogger.faq.a4: You get article templates, ready-to-copy texts in 9 languages, HD logos, banners, and a complete integration guide with SEO best practices.
blogger.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $50. We support Wise, PayPal, Mobile Money, and bank transfers. Payments processed within 48 hours.
blogger.faq.a6: Your blog should relate to expat life, travel, immigration, or similar topics. We provide article templates if you need inspiration!

chatter.faq.a1: It's simple: join Facebook groups for expats (like 'Expats in Spain', 'French in London'...), WhatsApp groups, Reddit, forums. When you see someone with a problem (visa, legal, emergency), share your unique link. When they call a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10. That's it!
chatter.faq.a2: It depends on your activity. 5 clients = $50. 20 clients = $200. Some chatters earn $500-2000/month by building a team of other chatters and earning 5% of their earnings forever.
chatter.faq.a3: Expat helpers are experienced expats who provide practical advice and guidance. They're not lawyers, but they know the local system well and can help with everyday questions about visas, administration, housing, etc.
chatter.faq.a4: 100% free. No fees, no investment needed. You just need to pass a quick quiz to prove you understand how SOS-Expat works, then you get your affiliate links immediately.
chatter.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $25. We support Wise (worldwide), Orange Money, Wave, MTN MoMo, M-Pesa, Airtel Money, and bank transfers. Payments processed within 48 hours.
chatter.faq.a6: No! You don't give advice. You just connect people who need help with our lawyers and expat helpers. You're a connector, not an expert.
chatter.faq.a7: Recruit other chatters with your special link. You earn $1 per call from your direct recruits (N1), and $0.50 per call from their recruits (N2). Your team size is unlimited!
chatter.faq.q1: What exactly do I have to do?

chatter.faq.quiz.answer: The quiz is super easy! Just 5 simple questions to make sure you understand how SOS-Expat works. 95% of people pass on the first try. And if you don't, you can retake it immediately. We even give you a short training video to help!

chatter.landing.earnings.title: What our Chatters earn
chatter.landing.faq.a1: A Chatter is a SOS-Expat ambassador who recommends the platform and earns commissions on each referred client or recruited provider.
chatter.landing.faq.a2: You earn $10 per paid call from a referred client and $5 per recruited provider. Bonuses up to +100% are possible for the monthly Top 3.
chatter.landing.faq.a3: Yes, registration for the Chatter program is 100% free. You just need to pass a qualification quiz (85% success rate required).
chatter.landing.faq.a4: You can withdraw your earnings via Wise, Mobile Money (Orange Money, Wave, MTN) or bank transfer once you reach the minimum threshold of $25.
chatter.landing.faq.a5: There are 5 levels (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond) with increasing bonuses from +5% to +20% on your commissions. You level up by reaching conversion goals.
chatter.landing.faq.a6: Absolutely not! The best Chatters interact naturally and share their link at the right moment. Quality always beats quantity. Authentic recommendations convert much better.
chatter.landing.faq.a7: You earn $5 per call received by providers you recruit for 6 months. If they become active providers, that's passive income for you!

faq.a1: Consultations with our qualified lawyers start from €49 for 20 minutes. For an exchange with an experienced expatriate, the rate is €19 for 30 minutes. No hidden fees, secure payment. You can choose your currency (EUR or USD).
faq.a2: SOS Expat operates in 197 countries worldwide. We connect 304 million expatriates with local lawyers and experts speaking 9 languages: French, English, German, Russian, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, Arabic, and Hindi.
faq.a3: Our SOS service operates 24/7. An expert or lawyer calls you back in less than 5 minutes, wherever you are in the world. Ideal for administrative, legal, or medical emergencies during your expatriation.
faq.a4: Choose an experienced expatriate for practical daily advice (housing, procedures, integration). Opt for a qualified lawyer for complex legal questions (contracts, disputes, international law). If in doubt, our advisors can guide you.
faq.a5: Yes, absolutely. All consultations are strictly confidential and secure. Lawyers are bound by professional secrecy. Your personal data is protected in accordance with GDPR and encrypted end-to-end.
faq.a6: If you're not satisfied with your consultation, contact our support within 24 hours. We will analyze your request and propose a suitable solution: free new consultation or partial refund depending on the case. Your satisfaction is our priority.
faq.answer1: On average, you are connected with a lawyer or experienced expatriate in less than 5 minutes, 24/7.
faq.answer2: SOS Expat covers over 197 countries with local experts speaking 9 different languages.
faq.answer3: You choose the type of expert (lawyer or expatriate), make the secure payment, and are called back in less than 5 minutes by an available expert.
faq.description: Everything you need to know about SOS Expat
faq.heading: Your questions,
faq.heroSubtitle: Quickly find answers about SOS Expat & Travelers
faq.login.a1: You can log in using your Google account (quick 1-click login) or with your email address and password. The Google button is available at the top of the form for instant login.
faq.login.a2: Click on the 'Forgot password?' link below the login form. You will receive an email with a link to securely reset your password. The process takes less than 2 minutes.
faq.login.a3: Yes, Google login uses the OAuth 2.0 protocol, one of the most secure authentication systems in the world. Your data is protected and we never store your Google password.
faq.login.a4: Yes, check the 'Remember me' box before logging in. You will stay logged in even after closing your browser. For your security, don't check this option on a shared device.
faq.login.a5: Yes, your SOS Expats account is accessible from any device (smartphone, tablet, computer). Simply log in with your credentials on each device.
faq.login.a6: First check your spam/junk folder. If the email still isn't there after 5 minutes, use the 'Forgot password' option to receive a new link. Make sure the email address is correct.
faq.login.a7: Click on the 'Create an account' link at the bottom of the login page. Registration takes less than 30 seconds with Google, or 2 minutes with email and password. You will immediately have access to all our services.
faq.login.a8: Absolutely. SOS Expats uses SSL/TLS encryption for all connections, complies with European GDPR, and never shares your data with third parties. Your information is stored securely and confidentially.

faq.register.a1: You can create an account in 30 seconds with Google (1 click) or by email. Simply enter your email, password, languages spoken, and phone number.
faq.register.a2: Yes, registration is 100% free. You only pay when you book a consultation with a lawyer or expert expatriate.
faq.register.a3: Your number allows experts to call you directly during consultations. We never use it for spam or advertising.
faq.register.a4: Yes, signing up with Google is the fastest method. One click and your account is created instantly and securely.
faq.register.a5: Absolutely. We use SSL/TLS encryption, comply with GDPR, and never share your data with third parties.
faq.register.a6: SOS Expats covers over 197 countries with verified local experts. Our network includes lawyers and experienced expatriates.
faq.register.a7: Less than 30 seconds with Google, about 1 minute by email. You immediately access all our services after registration.
faq.register.a8: Yes, you can modify all your information (languages, phone, email) at any time from your personal dashboard.

groupAdmin.faq.a3: Members who use your link get a $5 discount on their first consultation. It's a win-win!
groupAdmin.faq.a4: We provide ready-to-pin posts, cover banners, promotional images, welcome messages, and more - all translated in 9 languages.
groupAdmin.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $25. We support Wise, PayPal, and Mobile Money. Payments processed within 48 hours.

influencer.faq.a1: Create content about expat life, travel, or immigration on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok or your blog. Include your unique affiliate link. When your followers call a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10. That's it!
influencer.faq.a2: It depends on your audience size. 10 clients = $100. 50 clients = $500. Some influencers earn $1000-5000/month by finding lawyer/helper partners and earning $5 per call they receive.
influencer.faq.a3: Expat helpers are experienced expats who provide practical advice and guidance. They're not lawyers, but they know the local system well and can help with everyday questions about visas, administration, housing, etc.
influencer.faq.a4: You get ready-made banners, interactive widgets for your website, personalized QR codes, promo texts in 9 languages, and high-quality logos. Everything you need to promote professionally.
influencer.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $50. We support Wise, PayPal, and bank transfers. Payments processed within 48 hours.
influencer.faq.a6: Your followers automatically get 5% off their first call when they use your link. It's an exclusive benefit for your community!

registerClient.faq.a1: Click on 'Create an account', fill in the form with your email, choose a secure password, select the languages you speak and enter your phone number. Then accept the terms and conditions and click 'Create my account'. You will receive a confirmation email immediately.
registerClient.faq.a2: Yes, registration on SOS-Expat is 100% free and without commitment. You don't need a credit card to create your account. You can access all basic services for free.
registerClient.faq.a3: Yes, you can use the 'Continue with Google' button at the top of the form for quick one-click registration. Your information will be automatically retrieved from your Google account securely.
registerClient.faq.a4: SOS-Expat currently supports 9 languages: French, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Hindi and Mandarin Chinese. You can select multiple languages you speak during registration to find professionals who communicate in your language.
registerClient.faq.a5: Absolutely. We use bank-level SSL/TLS encryption to protect your data. We strictly comply with European GDPR and your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent. You can delete your account and data at any time.
registerClient.faq.a6: Yes, you can modify all your information (email, phone, languages, profile photo, etc.) from your personal dashboard at any time. You have full control over your data.
registerClient.faq.a7: Full registration takes less than 2 minutes. If you use Google sign-up, it's even faster: less than 30 seconds! You will receive a confirmation email immediately after creating your account.
registerClient.faq.a8: Our customer support team is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to help you. You can contact us via the Contact page or via live chat on the website. We usually respond within 48 hours.

registerExpat.faq.a1: Full registration takes about 5-10 minutes. You can save your progress and come back later if needed.
registerExpat.faq.a2: Yes, all your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal information without your explicit consent.
registerExpat.faq.a3: No, registration is completely free. You only pay when you use certain premium services or accept paid missions.
registerExpat.faq.a4: Absolutely! You can modify all your information from your dashboard at any time. Your profile stays flexible.
registerExpat.faq.a5: You can select one main country of intervention during registration, but you can add other countries from your profile once logged in.
registerExpat.faq.a6: There is no minimum required, but we recommend speaking at least 2 languages to maximize your help opportunities.
registerExpat.faq.a7: Our teams review each profile within 24-48h. You will receive an email once validated.
registerExpat.faq.a8: Yes, you can deactivate or delete your account at any time from the settings.

registerLawyer.faq.a1: Registration is simple: fill in the form with your professional information, specialties and experience. After your profile is validated by our team, you can start receiving requests from expat clients.
registerLawyer.faq.a2: You must be a bar-registered lawyer with at least one recognized specialty. We verify your diplomas and professional experience to ensure the quality of our services.
registerLawyer.faq.a3: Payments are secured via Stripe. You set your hourly rates and receive payments directly to your bank account after each consultation.
registerLawyer.faq.a4: Yes, you can indicate all the countries where you are authorized to practice. This increases your visibility among expats in those regions.
registerLawyer.faq.a5: Registration is completely free. Connection fees apply for consultations made through the platform. These fees are communicated transparently during your registration.
registerLawyer.faq.a6: Complete your profile with a detailed biography, add your education and specialties. Positive client reviews also increase your visibility.
registerLawyer.faq.a7: You will be in contact with expatriates from around the world who need legal advice: business law, international family law, immigration, international taxation, etc.
registerLawyer.faq.a8: You manage your availability freely via your dashboard. You can accept or decline consultation requests according to your schedule.

review.1.comment: I was dreading calling a lawyer. He was cool, clear, and ultra-efficient: solution found in 15 min thanks to local law in Brazil.
review.1.name: Thomas Laurent
review.2.comment: New in Lyon, prefecture panic. An expatriate called me back within minutes, explained everything in FR/EN. I felt supported.
review.2.name: Emily Johnson
review.3.comment: International health insurance: sorted out the same day. The bilingual lawyer clarified everything on the phone, with supporting documents. Clean and precise.
review.3.name: Li Wei
review.4.comment: Unexpected hospitalization while traveling. An expatriate guided me through the procedures and served as interpreter. Human, reassuring, effective.
review.4.name: Nok Suphansa
review.5.comment: Purchase in Lisbon: the lawyer called me back, checked the clauses, directed me to the right notary office. Fast and no surprises.
review.5.name: Ivan Petrov
review.6.comment: Canada visa stuck. An expatriate in Montreal gave me the right supporting documents and real deadlines. I saved weeks.
review.6.name: Awa Diop

sosCall.faq.a1: SOS Expat connects you immediately with verified international lawyers and expatriate experts. Select the type of expert, country, and desired language, then browse available profiles. You can contact the expert of your choice directly for a secure online consultation, available 24/7.
sosCall.faq.a2: Our platform offers two types of experts: international lawyers specialized in immigration law, expatriate taxation, international labor law, and legal protection; and experienced expatriates who share their practical expertise on daily life, installation, and administrative procedures in their host country.
sosCall.faq.a3: Yes, all our experts go through a rigorous verification process. Lawyers must provide their degrees, bar registrations, and professional references. Expatriates are selected based on their experience (minimum 3 years in their host country) and their ability to advise effectively. Each profile displays reviews from previous users.
sosCall.faq.a4: SOS Expat currently covers over 197 countries worldwide. Our experts are present on all continents, with a strong presence in Europe, North America, Asia-Pacific, Middle East, and Africa. Coverage is continuously expanding with the addition of new experts.
sosCall.faq.a5: Our platform is available in 9 languages: French, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, Arabic, and Hindi. You can filter experts by spoken language to ensure smooth communication during your consultation.
sosCall.faq.a6: After selecting an expert, you can initiate a consultation by video conference, chat, or phone call depending on availability. The consultation is secure and confidential. You receive a written summary of the advice after each session. Rates are displayed in advance and payment is secured via Stripe.
sosCall.faq.a7: Yes, our service operates 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The "Online" status indicates experts immediately available for a consultation. Even outside business hours, experts in different time zones can assist you. For legal emergencies, on-call lawyers are available.
sosCall.faq.a8: Rates vary depending on the type of expert and consultation duration. Consultations with experienced expatriates start from €19, while legal consultations with lawyers start from €49. Each profile clearly displays its rates. Packages and subscriptions are available for regular support.

testimonialOtherReviews: Discover other testimonials from expatriates and travelers who trusted our experts.
testimonials.comment1: Exceptional service! I was able to speak to a French lawyer from Bangkok in less than 2 minutes. Very professional and reassuring in my emergency situation.
testimonials.comment2: Thanks to SOS Expats, I was able to solve my administrative problem in Spain. The expat gave me valuable advice based on his personal experience.
testimonials.comment3: Very intuitive interface and responsive customer service. The lawyer was competent and helped me understand my rights regarding my employment contract in Canada.
testimonials.cta.description: Join over 15,000 expatriates who trust us for their procedures abroad.
testimonials.cta.subtitle: Join our community
testimonials.cta.title: Ready to get help?
testimonials.hero.subtitle: Discover authentic experiences from our users worldwide. Each testimonial is verified and represents a real story of help provided.
testimonials.hero.title: Customer testimonials
testimonials.meta.description: Discover authentic reviews from our expatriate customers in 197+ countries. Average rating 4.9/5. Verified testimonials from consultations with lawyers and expatriates.
testimonials.meta.title: SOS Expats Customer Reviews | 2347+ verified testimonials
testimonials.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or search
testimonials.review.1.comment: I needed urgent help for a visa problem in Thailand. In less than 5 minutes, I was connected with a French expatriate who knows the local system perfectly. He gave me practical advice and directed me to the right procedures. Exceptional service!
testimonials.review.10.comment: Complex international divorce. The lawyer guided me through all the legal procedures in two different countries. Exemplary professionalism.
testimonials.review.11.comment: Car accident in the UAE: the lawyer clearly explained my rights and insurance procedures. Everything was resolved much faster than expected.
testimonials.review.12.comment: Job search in the UK: the expatriate helped me adapt my CV to the local market and gave me interview tips. I found a position in 3 weeks!
testimonials.review.13.comment: Children's schooling in Italy: the expatriate explained the entire Italian school system and recommended the best bilingual schools. Super useful for a family move.
testimonials.review.14.comment: Customs problem in Morocco: the expatriate knew the procedures perfectly and helped me avoid significant additional costs.
testimonials.review.15.comment: Entrepreneur visa in the USA: the immigration lawyer helped me prepare a solid application. Visa obtained on the first try!
testimonials.review.16.comment: Settling in Vietnam: the expatriate gave me all the practical advice on housing, transportation, and daily life. Transition made much easier thanks to him!
testimonials.review.2.comment: Complicated move to Portugal. The expatriate helped me understand the tax system, opening an account, and even the best schools for my children. Really useful!
testimonials.review.3.comment: Employment contract in Germany: the lawyer analyzed all the clauses in detail and advised me on which points to renegotiate. An investment that saved me thousands of euros in the long run.
testimonials.review.4.comment: Work permit in Canada: thanks to the expatriate's advice, I avoided several mistakes that could have delayed my application by several months. Very professional.
testimonials.review.5.comment: Dispute with my landlord in Spain. The lawyer explained my rights clearly and gave me legal arguments to negotiate. Problem solved in 2 weeks!
testimonials.review.6.comment: Settling in Australia: the expatriate shared his experience about neighborhoods, health insurance, and even local tips. Huge time saver!
testimonials.review.7.comment: Starting a business in Japan: the expatriate knew the specific administrative procedures perfectly. He helped me avoid many bureaucratic pitfalls.
testimonials.review.8.comment: Tax problem in Mexico: the specialized lawyer helped me understand my obligations and regularize my situation. Fast and efficient service.
testimonials.review.9.comment: Real estate investment in Brazil: the expatriate's advice on the local market and pitfalls to avoid was invaluable. Highly recommend!
